title: Login Issues – Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log into their account after multiple password reset attempts.

title: Payment Failed – Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer’s billing address shows a different city. They updated it but it still displays the old one.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Customer reports the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13 devices.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received the amount yet.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving verification codes when trying to log in with 2FA enabled.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer tries to upload a new profile picture but receives a 'Upload failed' error.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal Failed
description: Customer’s subscription did not renew automatically even though auto-renew is enabled.

title: Email Notifications Not Received
description: Customer reports not receiving confirmation or update emails after ticket creation.

title: Delayed Account Activation
description: Customer registered successfully but account remains inactive after 24 hours.

title: Download Button Not Working
description: Download button on invoice page is unresponsive when clicked.

title: Transaction History Missing
description: Customer cannot see previous transactions on their dashboard.

title: UI Display Glitch on Mobile
description: Customer reports overlapping text and misaligned buttons on smaller mobile screens.

title: Invoice Email Sent Twice
description: Customer receives duplicate invoice emails every month after billing cycle.
